==Goals==

The maven plugin has two goals:

  * migrate:migrate - attempts to migrate the database to the latest version.
  * migrate:validate - checks to see if the database is up to date.

==Configuration==

|| *Option* || *Description* || *Required* || *Default* ||
|| defaultEnvironment || ... || No || the first environment ||
|| environments || Collection of one or more environments || Yes || N/A ||
|| environment/name || ... || Yes || N/A ||
|| environment/driverClass || ... || Yes || N/A ||
|| environment/username|| ... || Yes || N/A ||
|| environment/password|| ... || Yes || N/A ||

==Examples==

{{{
<plugin>
    <groupId>com.carbonfive</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-migration-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>0.9-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <configuration>
        <defaultEnvironment>test</defaultEnvironment>
        <environments>
            <environment>
                <name>default</name>
                <driverClass>com.mysql.jdbc.Driver</driverClass>
                <username>dev</username>
                <password>dev</password>
            </environment>
            <environment>
                <name>test</name>
                <jdbcURL>jdbc:mysql://localhost/adventure_planner_test</jdbcURL>
            </environment>
            <environment>
                <name>development</name>
                <jdbcURL>jdbc:mysql://localhost/adventure_planner_development</jdbcURL>
            </environment>
        </environments>
    </configuration>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>mysql</groupId>
            <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
            <version>5.1.5</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
</plugin>
}}}
